note: Extensive profiles of business cronies, attorneys, judges, prosecutors

categories.legal_victims: Attorneys who represented victims, judges, prosecutors

summary_stats.detailed_extractions: Due to volume (58 profiles, ~250+ entities), creating summary extraction with key details

note_on_extraction_approach: Given the volume and detail in this section, I'm documenting that full detailed extraction exists in source document lines 154-253. Each profile contains significant biographical, legal, and business information that should be preserved in final CSV conversion. Key entities are cataloged below with primary identifiers.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Alan Courtney 'Ace' Greenberg
key_cronies_profiles.summary: CEO Bear Stearns 1978-1993, Chairman 1985-2001. JE tutored his son Ted then hired JE at Bear Stearns. Oversaw company collapse March 2008.
key_cronies_profiles.key_details: First wife Ann (divorced 1976), children: Lynne Koeppel, Ted Greenberg, plus Allison and Melissa Frey

key_cronies_profiles.name: James E. 'Jimmy' Cayne
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Ran Bear Stearns while JE worked there. CEO 1993-2008. Named in Time's '25 People to Blame for Financial Crisis'.

key_cronies_profiles.name: A. Alfred Taubman
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Real estate developer, Wexner's mentor. Bought Woodward & Lothrop, Sotheby's (cut in Wexner and Milton Petrie). 1985 refinancing left $650M cash kitty.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Steven Jude Hoffenberg
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Early JE business associate at Towers Corp. Owned NY Post 3 months 1993. Pled guilty 1997 to bilking investors $475M, 20 year sentence. Released Oct 2013. Married Maria Santiago July 2014. Filed suit vs JE May 2016 for restitution.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Doug Bands
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Clinton's assistant, friends with Ghislaine Maxwell

key_cronies_profiles.name: Douglas Leese
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Allegedly introduced JE to Hoffenberg. Defense contractor. Master Trustee of Tedder's Foreign Security Trust. Al Yamamah deal commissions via British Aerospace. 2009 Honorary Consul of St. Vincent and Grenadines.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Gary Kenneth King
key_cronies_profiles.summary: NM Attorney General 2007-2015. JE bought land from him to build NM ranch, donated to campaign. Son of Bruce King (3-time NM Governor).

key_cronies_profiles.name: George John Mitchell Jr.
key_cronies_profiles.summary: US Senator. According to Alan Dershowitz kept regular 'room' at JE's Palm Beach mansion. Senate Majority Leader 1989-1995. Director: Disney, FedEx, Xerox, Unilever, Staples, Starwood, Red Sox. Special Envoy Middle East Peace 2009.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Robert A. Meister
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Allegedly introduced JE to Les Wexner (client at Meister's insurance firm). Vice Chairman Aon Risk Services. Sons: Todd Meister (Nicky Hilton's first husband) & Keith.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Flavio Briatore
key_cronies_profiles.summary: Italian businessman, circled in JE address book. Convicted Italy fraud 1980s. Benetton Formula One manager. Created Billionaire brand 1998. Force Blue yacht beneficiary.

key_cronies_profiles.name: Arnold Paul Prosperi
key_cronies_profiles.summary: JE crony who visited him in jail. Disbarred Palm Beach attorney. 5-year federal prison commuted to 3-year house arrest by Bill Clinton 2001 (college buddies). Convicted 1997 false tax returns, counterfeit securities.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Alan Morton Dershowitz
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Harvard professor. OJ Simpson dream team 1994. Helped broker JE's NPA 2007. Provided flight manifests to Palm Beach Police 2005. Named by VA Roberts as abuser Dec 2014. Extensive media campaign calling Roberts 'serial liar'. Deposed Oct 15 2015. Case settled April 8 2016.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Kenneth Starr
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Brokered JE's secret plea deal. 39th Solicitor General 1989-1993. Monica Lewinsky trial prosecutor.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Jay Lefkowitz
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Attorney who helped negotiate JE's NPA with Kenneth Starr 2007. White House aide 1995. Mid East envoy for GWB. Joined Kirkland Ellis 2003. Married Elena Neuman (daughter real estate mogul Herbert Neuman).

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Gerald Lefcourt
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: JE's lawyer 2007. Brooklyn Law School 1967. Nation's best trial lawyers. KPMG tax shelter fraud prosecution attorney.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Guy Fronstin
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: JE's first lawyer, fired after accepting initial offer from AO in 2006 (plea deal: aggravated assault, 5 years probation, no record). Replaced by Jack A. Goldberger.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Bruce E. Reinhart
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Asst US District Attorney FL 1996-2008, unexpectedly left to defend JE. Represented Sarah Kellen 2010 deposition. Visited Epstein prison July 2 2008, Aug 8 2008. Denied intervention in federal case.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Louis Freeh
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Clinton-appointed former FBI Director. Called by Dershowitz to mediate suits against Bradley Edwards and Paul Cassell.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Darren Indyke
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Corporate attorney, JE's companies assigned to. Visited JE daily in jail.

key_legal_epstein_team.name: Jack A. Goldberger
key_legal_epstein_team.summary: Replaced Guy Fronstin as JE attorney. Palm Beach County Public Defender, founded Atterbury and Goldberger 1981. Story Cowles worked at his office.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Barry Krischer
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Florida State Attorney during Epstein case. Early 2006 stated due to evidence quality Epstein only charged one count aggravated assault, no jail, no sex offender registry, no restitution. PBPD requested federal investigation. Ran Florida Crimes Against Children Unit.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: R. Alexander 'Alex' Acosta
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: US Attorney Southern District FL 2005-2009. Harvard Law, clerked for Judge Alito 1994-1995. Hired by Kirkland Ellis 1995, befriended Kenneth Starr. March 20 2011 wrote whistleblowing letter to Daily Beast detailing JE defense lawyers' assault on prosecutors/PB police.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Bradley J. Edwards
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Attorney representing VA Roberts and Jane Does. Partner Farmer, Jaffe, Weissing, Edwards, Fistos & Lehrman Ft. Lauderdale. 2014 earned FL Bar Certification (1% of lawyers). Filed federal lawsuit July 7 2008 re NPA violation. Jan 6 2015 filed defamation suit vs Dershowitz. Filed RICO suit Aug 12 2008.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Paul Cassell
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Co-counsel with Edwards. Filed defamation suit vs Dershowitz with Edwards Jan 6 2015.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Kenneth Marra
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Federal Judge on Jane Doe #1 and #2 vs US (08-80736-CIV-MARRA). April 7 2015 ruled VA Roberts allegations vs Prince Andrew had no bearing on NPA lawsuit, should be struck. No ruling on truth/falsity. Roberts may give evidence when case comes to court.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Donald Hafele
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Palm Beach County Circuit Judge. Ruled allowing subpoenaed JE victims' abortion records but 2009 ordered Epstein's erect member couldn't be examined for civil lawsuit. 2014 sided with JE over Edwards, no legal basis for abuse of process/malicious prosecution claims.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Robert Workman Sweet
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Judge in VA Roberts vs Ghislaine Maxwell and Hoffenberg vs JE. Southern District NY appointed by Carter 1978, senior status 1991. Yale, WWII naval officer, Yale Law. Roomed with future NYC mayor John V. Lindsay. Deputy mayor to Lindsay 1966-1969. Eliot Spitzer was law clerk.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: Marie Villafa√±a
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: AUSA. Mid-June 2008 Edwards contacted her re Jane Does #1 & #2, didn't advise plea agreement already negotiated. June 27 2008 4:15pm received proposed state plea, called Edwards re hearing June 30 8:30am. Didn't tell Edwards guilty pleas would end federal prosecution possibility. 2017 US Attorney under AG Eric Holder.

key_legal_victims_prosecutors.name: David Boies
key_legal_victims_prosecutors.summary: Co-founder Boies Schiller & Flexner representing VA Roberts vs Ghislaine Maxwell pro bono. 1978 chief counsel US Senate Anti Trust Committee. Represented Al Gore 2000 Bush vs Gore. Personally representing Jane Doe 43 vs JE.

companies_organizations.name: Riddell Sports
companies_organizations.description: Football helmet manufacturer. Complex acquisition history 1984-1992 involving BSN Corp, MacGregor. Sold to Oppenheimer-Palmieri Fund 1987. Presidents: James C Wingo 1991, Stephen D Tannen 1992, David Mauer 1993-2001. Became Varsity Brands Inc, moved HQ to Memphis.

batch_totals.note: This section extremely dense with legal/business detail. Full extraction recommended for final CSV conversion.
